product.title: Thunderstorm Aluminium Venetian
product.description: The grey thnderstorm aluminium venetian blind is a lovely, darker grey tone - ideal for pairing with darker colour in the rest of your room, or for being the darker focal point of your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

relproducts.title: Roma Thunderbird - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Roma thunderbird is not a shade to be missed - as in, it simply can't be. Bold and memorable, this blind is almost opaque, yet doesn't block out the light entirely, making for a great compromise. Don't be shy; use the thunderbird as a central feature in your white or cream kitchen, or go bold in the bathroom by opting for a non-traditional colour scheme of red and white. Or you might find that this daring red provides you with all the motivation you need in your home office.

relproducts.title: Rebel Thunder
relproducts.description: Rebel thunder made to measure vertical blind.

relproducts.title: Aria Thunder
relproducts.description: Aria thunder made to measure vertical blind.

relproducts.title: Roma Thunderbird - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The roma in thunderbird is the ideal filter blind for keeping just the right amount of light in your room when you need a little privacy or shade. Combine with that the dark, red hue and you have style and usability all in one. This strong, striking blind is here to make a statement, and a statement it will make. Help it along by placing against white or cream walls in your kitchen or dining room to really make it pop.

relproducts.title: Lux Thunder Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

relproducts.title: Rebel Thunder Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The cracked/ marble effect provides a textured look and feel to the fabric. Available in other colours. Rebel thunder roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

relproducts.title: Legacy Thunder Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Using matt and sheen threads to create a soft leaf-like shaped pattern. Available in other colours. Legacy thunder roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

relproducts.title: Aria Thunder Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Intertwining wavy line design created by a two tone effect from matt and sheen threads. Aria thunder roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

relproducts.title: Semana Thunder Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Using matt and sheen threads of the chosen colour to create an eye catching marbled effect. Other colours available. Semana thunder roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

relproducts.title: Thunder Grey & Stone - 50mm Slat
relproducts.description: This thunder grey & stone brings softness, beauty and contemporary flair to your home in an instant, thanks to the smooth, light slats and contrasting warm tapes. This combination of cool and cosy shades, plus the contrast of hard wood slats and soft fabric tapes makes this this thunder grey & stone brings softness, beauty and contemporary flair to your home in an instant, thanks to the smooth, light slats and contrasting warm tapes.
